001
002package com.commercetools.api.client.error;
003
004import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpException;
005import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpRequest;
006import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpResponse;
007import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ResponseSerializer;
008import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.error.*;
009
010public class ApiHttpExceptionFactory implements HttpExceptionFactory {
011    private final ResponseSerializer responseSerializer;
012
013    public ApiHttpExceptionFactory(ResponseSerializer serializer) {
014        this.responseSerializer = serializer;
015    }
016
017    public ResponseSerializer getResponseSerializer() {
018        return responseSerializer;
019    }
020
021    @Override
022    public ApiHttpException createClientException(ApiHttpRequest request, ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> response) {
023        final ResponseSerializer serializer = getResponseSerializer();
024        String message = "Client error response [url] " + request.getUri().toString() + " [status code] "
025                + response.getStatusCode() + " [reason phrase] " + response.getMessage();
026
027        switch (response.getStatusCode()) {
028            case 400:
029                return new BadRequestException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()),
030                    request.getHeaders(), message, response, request, serializer);
031            case 401:
032                return new UnauthorizedException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()),
033                    request.getHeaders(), message, response, request, serializer);
034            case 403:
035                return new ForbiddenException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()),
036                    request.getHeaders(), message, response, request, serializer);
037            case 404:
038                return new NotFoundException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()),
039                    request.getHeaders(), message, response, request, serializer);
040            case 409:
041                return new ConcurrentModificationException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()),
042                    request.getHeaders(), message, response, request, serializer);
043        }
044        return new ApiClientException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()), response.getHeaders(),
045            message, response, request);
046    }
047
048    public static HttpExceptionFactory of(ResponseSerializer serializer) {
049        return new ApiHttpExceptionFactory(serializer);
050    }
051}
